title: Ninkurra
extract:
In Sumerian mythology, Ninkurra (Lady Pasture) was a minor mother goddess, daughter of Enki and Ninsar. Mother of Uttu by Enki. In an alternative tradition she was the mother (by Enki) of Nin-imma, the deification of the female sex organs

References

Michael Jordan, Encyclopedia of Gods, Kyle Cathie Limited, 2002
